sentences.en: A succulent and complex Pinot Noir showing smouldering savoury and gamey character.
sentences.cn: 这是一款极其鲜美而复杂的黑比诺,风味独特.

sentences.en: A succulent and complex Pinot smouldering savoury and gamey character.
sentences.cn: 这是一款极其鲜美而复杂的黑皮诺,风味独特.

sentences.en: Alligators are known to have the most succulent meat.
Cook pieces of succulent chicken with ample garlic and a little sherry.
sentences.cn: 烹饪鲜美滑嫩的鸡肉时多加些大蒜，并滴入少许雪利酒。

sentences.en: Diners can enjoy succulent cherry tomatoes filled with a nutty sesame sauce.
sentences.cn: 食客品尝到鲜嫩多汁的樱桃西红柿里面填满了坚果的芝麻酱.

sentences.en: Many have a succulent growth form with swollen stems or leaves.
sentences.cn: 有很多种类的盐土植物具有肥厚的茎叶,属于肉质植物.

sentences.en: Outsourcing has succulent fruit involucre, mature natural cracking.
sentences.cn: 果实外包有肉质总苞, 成熟后自然开裂.

sentences.en: Palate: Full - bodied, with silky tannins and a long , succulent and flavorful finish.
sentences.cn: 口感: 厚身的酒体, 丝般柔滑的单宁,香味悠长, 完美可口.

sentences.en: Pink - fleshed Pomelos from my friend Brian's Hawaiian backyard. Sweet and succulent!
sentences.cn: 夏威夷人后院的桃红色长胖的柚. 甜点和多汁植物!

sentences.en: South American bean having very long succulent pods.
sentences.cn: 南美洲的一种豆类,结有很长的且多汁的豆荚.

sentences.en: Take it our now if you want it to be succulent.
sentences.cn: 如果你想吃嫩牛排现在就取出来.

sentences.en: The musk ox steak on my plate was seductively dark and succulent.
sentences.cn: 摆在我盘子里的麝牛牛排看上去颜色很深,鲜嫩多汁,非常诱人.

sentences.en: With succulent, herbaceous , species, water pressure at the nozzle is critical.
sentences.cn: 对肉食植物 、 草本植物来说, 喷头的水位要求很严格.

sentences.en: You got a velvet mouth youre so succulent and beautiful.
sentences.cn: 你得到了我多汁的唇～像天鹅一样的美丽.

words.tran_cn: 青饲料；鲜美多汁；富于趣味

trans.tran_cn: 多汁的，多水分的，多汁性的，（植物）茎叶肥厚含水分多的，肉质的，极有兴趣的，津津有味的，有活力的

trans.tran_en: a plant such as a  cactus  , that has thick soft leaves or stems that can hold a lot of liquid
